00036     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040         //----------  management  ----------
00042 
00043         Vector<D, N> () { }
00045 
00047         Vector<D, N> (N x0, ... );
00048 
00049         //----------  access      ----------
00050 
00052 
00054         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00056 
00058         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00059 
00061         static unsigned dimension (void);
00062 
00063         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00064 
00067         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00070         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00073         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00074 
00076         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00079         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00082         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00085         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s) const;
00087 
00089         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00092         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s) const;
00094 
00096         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00097 
00099         N sqnorm (void) const;
00100 
00102         bool operator==(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00103             for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00104                 if (x[i] != other[i]) return false;
00105             }
00106             return true;
00107         }
00108 
00110 
00112         bool operator<(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00113             if (sqnorm() == other.sqnorm()) {
00114                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00115                     if (x[i] < other[i]) return true;
00116                     if (x[i] > other[i]) return false;
00117                 }
00118             }
00119             return sqnorm() < other.sqnorm();
00120         }
00121 
00123 
00124         N *data () { return x; }
00125 
00126     private:
00127         N x[D]; 
00128     };

00137     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00138             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00139             x () {
00140         x[0] = x0;
00141         unsigned i = 0;
00142         va_list argp;
00143         va_start (argp, x0);
00144         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00145             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00146         }
00147         va_end (argp);
00148     }

00152     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00153             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00154         assert(i < D);
00155         return x[i];
00156     }
00157 
00158     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00159             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00160         assert(i < D);
00161         return x[i];
00162     }

00164     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00165             unsigned Vector<D, N>::dimension (void) {
00166         return D;
00167     }

00171     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00172             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00173         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00174         return *this;
00175     }
00176 
00177     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00178             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00179         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00180         return *this;
00181     }
00182 
00183     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00184             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00185     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00186     return *this;
00187     }
00188 
00189     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00190             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00191         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00192         Z = *this;
00193         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00194         return Z;
00195     }
00196 
00197     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00198             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00199     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00200     Z = *this;
00201     return (Z += Y);
00202     }
00203 
00204     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00205             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00206     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00207     Z = *this;
00208     return (Z -= Y);
00209     }
00210 
00211     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00212             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) const {
00213     Vector <D, N>Z;
00214     Z = *this;
00215     return Z *= s;
00216     }
00217 
00218     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00219             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00220     N dot = 0.;
00221     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00222         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00223 
00224     return dot;
00225     }
00226 
00227     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00228             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) const {
00229     return operator* (1./s);
00230     }
00231 
00232     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00233             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const {
00234         Vector<D, N> tmp;
00235         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00236             tmp[i] = x[i]/X[i];
00237         return tmp;
00238     }

00241     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00242             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00243         return operator* (*this);
00244     }

00254     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00255             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00256         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00257         o << "<";
00258         for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++) o << v[i] << ",";
00259         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00260         return o;
00261     }
00262     
00264 
00268     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00269             std::istringstream &operator >> (std::istringstream &in, Vector<D, N> &v) {
00270         char bracket;
00271         while (bracket != '<' && !in.eof()) { in >> bracket; }
00272         for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++) {
00273             in >> v[i] >> bracket;
00274         }
00275         in >> v[v.dimension ()-1] >> bracket;
00276         return in;
00277     }

00298             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);

00305     template <typename N>
00306             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00307         static Vector<3, N> c;
00308 
00309         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00310         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00311         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00312 
00313         return c;
00314     }
00315 
00317 
00322     template <typename N>
00323             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00324         static Vector<4, N> d;
00325         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00326         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00327         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00328         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00329         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00330         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00331 
00332         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00333         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00334         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00335         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00336 
00337         return d;
00338     }
00339 
00341 
00344     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00345             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00346         static Vector<D, N> n;
00347         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00348         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00349         return n;
00350     }
00351 }
